summary: Highlights indents when "expandtab" option is on.
name: MarkShift
description:
Usefull for editing indented source files which have been
edited with the expand tab setting. When activated the
first space out of every N spaces is highlighted. N is
worked out automaticlly from the shiftwidth setting of the
buffer.

versions.release_notes: Changed the distance between the highlight bar to use &ts as apposed to &sw as per suggestion gowri.satyanarayana@oracle.com, April 24, 2003 22:12
Was not able to toggle the shift highlighting off due to misnaming of a variable
